articles.description: At least 74 migrants died in a shipwreck on Thursday off the coast of Khums, Libya, the United Nations' International Organization for Migration (IOM) said.

articles.title: Did 2020 prove that liberals can't win?

articles.content:
THE POINT -- NOW ON YOUTUBE! 
In each episode of his weekly YouTube show, Chris Cillizza will delve a little deeper into the surreal world of politics. Click to subscribe!

articles.author: Chris Isidore, CNN Business
articles.title: Boeing issues surprisingly upbeat outlook for Chinese aircraft demand
articles.description: Global demand for new aircraft is likely to be hurt for decades because of the Covid-19 pandemic. Yet Boeing just increased its industrywide Chinese sales forecast for the next 20 years -- above where that estimate stood in pre-pandemic times.
